title: Creating a New Invoice
body:
Creating a New Invoice¶

To bill a customer using the Maha Platform, you should create a new invoice following the steps below.

  1. Click the in the ribbon

  2. Click Finance

  3. Click Revenue

  4. Click Invoices

  5. Click the in the upper right hand corner

  6. Choose a program

  7. Choose a customer

  8. Select the current date

  9. Select invoice due date

  10. Add notes

  11. Click Add Line Item

    • Choose a project

    • Choose a revenue type

    • Describe the item

    • Enter item unit price

    • Enter tax rate

    • Enter quantity

    • If item is tax deductible, check box

    • Click Done

  12. Add more line items if necessary

  13. Click Save
